wikipedia_page.main: Ernest "Imshi" Mason DFC (29 July 1913 – 15 February 1942) was a British World War II flying ace, credited with one Luftwaffe and 14 Regia Aeronautica aircraft destroyed, two shared destroyed, three damaged and another three shared damaged in the air. Mason claimed one and 13 shared destroyed on the ground.

response: * Ernest Mason, World War II flying ace
